sentences.sContent: a provocative act by a terrorist group
She was accused of being deliberately provocative .

remMethod.val: pro (在前) + voc (声音) + ative → 在前面大声喊叫 → 挑衅的

words.tran: 刺激的；令人生气的，激怒人的

trans.tranCn: 挑衅的； 惹人讨厌的
trans.tranOther: provocative behaviour, remarks etc are intended to make people angry or upset, or to cause a lot of discussion
